metadata.title: CVE-2024-4340 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Passing a heavily nested list to sqlparse.parse() leads to a Denial ofService due to RecursionError.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-4340` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-sqlparse - 0.4.2-1ubuntu0.22.04.2
sqlformat - 0.4.2-1ubuntu0.22.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlparse package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.4.2-1ubuntu0.22.04.2').
